mapper.sql: id, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, fromUserId, toUserId, `type`, productName, price, `number`, productCoverImg, bigDecimal, orderId, productId
mapper.select:
SELECT tid.* FROM t_income_detail tid WHERE tid.fromUserId = #{fromUserId} AND tid.toUserId = #{toUserId} AND tid.`type` NOT IN (2) ORDER BY tid.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{limit},#{limitSize}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tid.bigDecimal,0)),0) AS balance, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(tt.bigDecimal,0)) FROM t_income_detail tt WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tt.create_time,'%y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y-%m-%d') AND tt.type = 1 AND tt.toUserId = tid.toUserId),0) AS todayIncome, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(tt.bigDecimal,0)) FROM t_income_detail tt WHERE tt.type IN (0,1) AND tt.toUserId = tid.toUserId),0) AS totalIncome, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(tt.bigDecimal,0)) FROM t_income_detail tt WHERE tt.type IN (0) AND tt.toUserId = tid.toUserId AND tt.toUserId != tt.fromUserId),0) AS distributionIncome, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(score) FROM t_user_score us WHERE us.userId = tid.toUserId),0) AS totalScore FROM t_income_detail tid WHERE tid.toUserId = #{toUserId}
